problem_summary_simple: Check if an array's elements are either always increasing or always decreasing.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the array, maintaining flags for whether an increasing or decreasing trend has been observed. Return true if at most one trend is observed.
key_insights: An array can be both non-decreasing and non-increasing if all elements are the same.
We only need to detect if both an increasing and a decreasing trend exist simultaneously.
The condition `not inc or not dec` correctly captures that either no increase or no decrease (or neither) must be true for monotonicity.
